they split the seasons into 2 parts because 1, it is a new show and they were looking at the ratings before filming more, and two, you get more ratings during midseason premiers/finales ... it's a canadian thing, then specialty staions caught onto it so people would have to subscribe for the whole year.. now everyone seems to be doing it... blame canada :) .. eh!

You have to be kidding me.....this show was a waste of band-width to download the first 4 episodes....as the song goes "Dont believe the hype" If there is any justice in the universe they will can this show in the too stupid bin and not release any more of the crap on mankind....BAD!!!BAD!!!BAD!!!

thank God they cancelled it.....It was a drawn-out bad B-grade movie that given the choice of watching that crap again or slamming my testicles in a kitchen drawer for the same length of time......I'd opt for the latter :)

@ dardar6t9, they didn't cancel the show!

If you saw the original V as a kid, you may be disappointed trying to compare this back to that, times were different and the Mini-series back then was EPIC.  Since that time there have been gazilions of shows about aliens trying to take us over.  

That doesn't mean this new version doesn't have some interesting parts.  It's got a lot to compete with and it's just getting started.
The V leader where's Pantyhose for crying out loud that makes it a watch no matter what. 8-)
